net.javachallenge.api

Interface Player


  • public interface Player
    The player interface is the abstract representation of a player in the game. Note that this interface is immutable, thus, its object stores the information of just this turn and will not be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Returns the id of the player.
      int getLastActiveRound()
      Deprecated. 
      int getMaterial(Material material)
      Returns the quantity of the given material owned by the player.
      int getMoney()
      Returns the amount of money owned by the player.
      int getTimeToLive()
      Returns the time to live, i.e., the number of the last round where the player were active (considered as living).

        Returns the quantity of the given material owned by the player.

        int getMoney()
        Returns the amount of money owned by the player.

      • getTimeToLive

        int getTimeToLive()
        Returns the time to live, i.e., the number of the last round where the player were active (considered as living).
        Returns:
        the time to live

      • getLastActiveRound

        @Deprecated
int getLastActiveRound()
        Deprecated. 
        Please use getTimeToLive instead of this method.
